meanings.definition: A person who is an expert in dietetics.
meanings.sent1: The dietitians at the hospital help patients choose healthy foods.
meanings.sent2: Many dietitians work in schools to promote good nutrition among students.
meanings.sent3: The dietitians joked that they could identify every vegetable blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: She was a dietitian by day, but her friends called her the food guru.
meanings.sent5: The dietitians' knowledge of nutrition was as vast as the ocean.

meanings.sent1: The team of dietitians collaborated on creating a balanced meal plan.
meanings.sent2: In the conference, the dietitians shared their experiences working with athletes.
meanings.sent3: The dietitians in the cafeteria were always surrounded by delicious food.
meanings.sent4: The group of dietitians were like a squad of nutrition superheroes.
meanings.sent5: The dietitians' office was filled with books on healthy eating habits.
